member.name: T:Enderlook.Exceptions.ImpossibleStateException
member.summary:
Represents a code state that in theory it should never happen.
Used when the compiler produces error because it can't infer that all code path returns a value.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Exceptions.ImpossibleStateException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of error that represents a code state that in theory it should never happen.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Exceptions.ImpossibleStateException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of error that represents a code state that in theory it should never happen.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Exceptions.ImpossibleStateException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates an instance of error that represents a code state that in theory it should never happen.
member.param: Reference to a inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
